title: HOUR 2- Mike Florio Sep 23, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Mike Florio Sep 23, 2020
description:
Mike Florio talks to Dan about why the coaches in the NFL were heavily fined for not wearing a mask on the sidelines. Mike says that it was the agreement that the coaches signed and that it is a rule that will probably not change.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
